title: 2008 Ford F350 Super Duty Lariat Super Cab 4x4 Long Bed Diesel
description:
**ONE OWNER** **TURBO DIESEL** **LONG BED** **HEATED LEATHER** **TOW PACKAGE**

With this year's increase in output for the PowerStroke Turbodiesel V8, robust new chassis and numerous refinements to the cabin, the 2008 Ford F-350 Super Duty Lariat Super Cab 4x4 Long Bed is back in competitive form in the 1-ton pickup class.

The Ford F-350 Super Duty one-ton pickup has been redesigned for 2008. Under the skin, a number of major upgrades take place. Ford says the chassis is stronger than before and now has a new type of coating for improved corrosion resistance. The rear suspension has also been tweaked to improve ride and handling without compromising capability. The PowerStroke diesel engine grows from 6.0 to 6.4 liters and now makes an impressive 350 horsepower and 650 pound-feet of torque. Also new this year are higher-grade cabin materials, a standard MP3 audio jack, and available power telescoping/folding side mirrors.

behind that grille is a larger PowerStroke diesel engine. It's now at 6.4 liters, versus 6.0 liters last year, and features twin turbochargers a small one for quick response off the line and a larger one that kicks in to beef up the midrange and common-rail fuel injection with high-tech injectors. Because these injectors administer fuel in up to five metered spurts per combustion cycle rather than all at once, reliability is improved, emissions are reduced and the engine even runs quieter. Another benefit is quick startup this diesel can fire up in under 2 seconds at minus-20 degrees.

This F350 is also equipped with Factory Brake Control, Rear Power Sliding Window, Power Seats, and Power Options.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions.

title: 2011 Chevy Avalanche LTZ 4x4
description:
**CREW CAB ROOM** **DVD** **NAVIGATION** **HEATED LEATHER** **POWER SUNROOF** **BACK UP CAMERA** **TOW PACKAGE**

Thanks to its practical midgate configuration, the 2011 Chevrolet Avalanche LTZ 4X4 is an ideal crew-cab pickup for carrying a combination of passengers and cargo. The Avalanche features Versatile midgate-based body style; smooth ride; comfortable seating.

The top-drawer LTZ offers standard 20-inch polished alloy wheels, outside mirrors with integrated turn signals, an adaptive suspension, leather upholstery, adjustable pedals, driver memory, heated and ventilated front seats, an auto-dimming rearview mirror, a navigation system, a rearview camera and a Bose surround-sound audio system.

The Avalanche is powered by a 5.3-liter V8 that generates 320 horsepower and 335 pound-feet of torque. A six-speed automatic transmission is standard. Fuel Economy clocks in at 15 MPG City and 21 MPG Hwy. A properly equipped Avalanche can tow up to 8,100 pounds.

Standard safety features on the Chevrolet Avalanche include antilock disc brakes, stability control, front side-impact airbags and full-length side curtain airbags with a rollover sensor, plus GM's OnStar emergency communications system. Standard safety features on the Chevrolet Avalanche include antilock disc brakes, stability control, front side-impact airbags and full-length side curtain airbags with a rollover sensor, plus GM's OnStar emergency communications system.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

description:
The 2007 Chevrolet Silverado LT Z71 Crew Cab 4x4 Short Bed stands as a major contender for top honors in the full-size-pickup segment. The Silverado features Refined and very quiet ride even with heavy-duty towing package, excellent fit and finish inside, seats are comfortable for long drives, comprehensive list of safety equipment.

This Silverado is equipped with air-conditioning a trip computer, OnStar telematics, a 40/20/40-split front bench seat, a tilt steering wheel, deep-tinted windows, chrome grille trim, alloy wheels, a CD player, cruise control, full power accessories, cloth seating, keyless entry, power drivers seat, an auto-dimming rearview mirror and a leather-wrapped steering wheel. The Z71 Off-Road Package adds skid plates, off-road suspension and locking rear differential.

Powering the Silverado is a 5.3-liter V8 pushing out 315 hp, and 338 lb-ft of torque. feature Active Fuel Management that shuts down four cylinders under light-load conditions such as highway cruising to promote greater fuel economy. Fuel Economy clocks in at 14 MPG City and 19 MPG Hwy.

description:
**LOCAL TRADE IN** **CREW CAB ROOM** The 2010 Ford F-150 XLT XTR Super Crew 4x4 Short Bed is an excellent all-around truck with a Refined ride, quiet interior, top crash-test scores, and a good-looking and functional cabin.

This F-150 is equipped with Cloth Interior, Power Drivers Seat, Adjustable Pedals, Factory Brake Control, Sync Multi Media System, Power Options and Tow Package.

Powering the F150 is a 5.4-liter V8 with 320 hp and 390 lb-ft. Fuel Economy clocks in at 14 MPG City and 18 MPG Hwy. Properly equipped, an F-150 with the 5.4-liter V8 can tow up to 11,300 pounds and carry a 3,030-pound payload.

Antilock disc brakes, stability control, trailer sway control and a full complement of airbags including front seat side and full-length side curtain are standard across the board. title: 2009 Cadillac Escalade EXT Ultimate Luxury AWD V8
description:
**DVD** **CREW CAB ROOM** **NAVIGATION** **BACK UP CAMERA**

The 2009 Cadillac Escalade EXT's distinctive styling, versatility and gobs of V8 power keep it atop the dwindling list of luxurious pickups. The Escalade EXT offers Potent and smooth powertrain, luxurious ride, attractive interior, versatile midgate design feature.

The Escalade EXT owes this split personality to its innovative "midgate" design. In normal operation, the midgate serves as the cabin's rear wall, separating the plush five-passenger interior from the truck bed. When more cargo room is needed, the midgate can be lowered and the rear seats stowed, allowing the 5-foot-long truck bed to extend 3 more feet into the cabin.

The 2009 Cadillac Escalade EXT is a premium full-size crew cab pickup truck. Equipment includes xenon headlights, a roof rack, a road-sensing adaptive suspension, a fold-down midgate, heated/cooled seats, power-adjustable front seats with driver memory settings, leather upholstery, wood grain trim, dual-zone automatic climate control, remote engine start and hands-free Bluetooth via OnStar. Also standard are a navigation system with real-time traffic and an eight-speaker Bose surround-sound audio system with a CD/DVD/MP3 player and satellite radio.

Powering the Escalade EXT is a potent 6.2-liter V8 producing 403 horsepower and 417 pound-feet of torque. Power is fed through a six-speed automatic transmission with a tow/haul mode. EPA fuel economy estimates stand at 12 mpg city/19 mpg highway and 14 mpg in combined driving.

The 2009 Cadillac Escalade EXT comes standard with antilock disc brakes, stability control and full-length side curtain airbags with rollover protection.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

title: 2007 Ford Explorer Sport Trac Limited 4x4 V8
description:
**CREW CAB ROOM** **V8 POWER** The 2007 Ford Explorer Sport Trac Limited 4x4 V8 is a compact truck/suv combination that features a Roomy cabin, strong V8, hidden storage compartments, and nice ride and handling balance.

This Sport Trac is equipped with composite cargo box, Heated Leather, power windows and mirrors, keyless entry, cruise control, air conditioning and CD player. The Limited Package adds color-keyed bumpers and side mirrors, foglamps, side-step bars, 18-inch wheels, a power driver seat, and leather wrapping for the steering wheel and gearshift knob are thrown into the mix.

This Sport Trac is powered by a 4.6-liter V8 rated for 292 hp and 300 lb-ft of torque. The Control Trac four-wheel-drive system has three modes. Intended for everyday driving, 4x4 Auto mode routes power only to the rear wheels until they slip, at which point power is delivered automatically to the front wheels. The 4x4 High mode provides a 50/50 power split to the front and rear wheels, making it ideal for off-road or severe winter conditions. The 4x4 Low mode locks the transfer case and is for the really deep stuff, steep grades and pulling a boat out of the water. Fuel Economy clocks in at 13 MPG City and 18 MPG Hwy. Properly outfitted, the 2007 Explorer Sport Trac can pull up to 6,800 pounds.

Antilock disc brakes, stability control, front-seat side airbags and a tire pressure monitor are all standard.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

title: 2005 Chevy Avalanche LT Z71 4x4
description:
**CREW CAB ROOM** **POWER SUNROOF** **HEATED LEATHER** **TOW PACKAGE**

Combining the comforts of a Suburban with the practicality of a Silverado, the 2005 Chevy Avalanche LT Z71 4x4 is a crossover vehicle that creatively provides the best of both worlds. The Avalanche features a Versatile and innovative cab configuration, strong V8 engine, substantial towing ability, and makes for a comfortable daily driver.

This Avalanche is also equipped with Adjustable Pedals, Driver Memory, Rear Air/Heat, Power Options and Tow Package.

Powering the Avalanche is a 5.3L V8 Engine that gets Fuel Economy of 13 MPG City and 17 MPG Hwy.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.

title: 2010 Chevy Silverado 1500 LS Crew Cab 4x4 Short Bed
description:
**CREW CAB ROOM** Capable and comfortable, the 2010 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 LS Crew Cab 4x4 Short Bed is a fully competitive full-size pickup. The Silverado features a Smooth and quiet ride, agreeable seats, powerful optional V8s, and comprehensive standard safety equipment.

This Silverado is equipped with Cloth Interior, Power Options, Bed Liner, Soft Top Tonneau Cover and Tow Package.

Powering this Silverado is a 4.8-liter V8 the pushes out 295 hp, and 305 lb-ft of torque. Fuel Economy clocks in at 14 MPG City and 18 MPG Hwy. Properly equipped, a Silverado 1500 can tow up to 10,700 pounds.

Antilock brakes front disc, rear drum are standard, with an all-disc setup available via the Max Trailering package. Stability control, front side and side curtain airbags are also standard.

Give us a call to schedule a test drive or if you have additional questions. Warranty available for purchase.
